column3: Resources Required (0 = none; 5 = hard and expensive)
column4: Positive Impact on Security (0 = negligible but good practice; 5 = dramatic improvement)

column1: Manage all software on office devices

column2: Provide licenses for proprietary software if that software is required and a staff member does not have a license
Change settings on their computer to remind them when software is in need of updating
Provide internet access when necessary to download updates (which may be large)
Identify and provide copies of software that is currently pirated
Warn the team if there is an infection on their computer and take appropriate steps to address the problem
